mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation(reservationNum, checkIn, checkOut, pet_type, pet_su, num, hostNum, totalCost) VALUES (reservation_seq.NEXTVAL, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{pet_type}, #{pet_su}, #{num}, #{hostNum}, #{totalCost})
mapper.select: SELECT reservationNum, TO_CHAR(checkIn,'YYYY/MM/DD') checkIn, TO_CHAR(checkOut,'YYYY/MM/DD') checkOut, pet_su, r.num, r.hostNum, pet_type, (checkOut-checkIn) check_day, cost From reservation r JOIN host h ON r.hostNum=h.hostNum WHERE reservationNum=#{reservationNum}
